title: As BOC, I want to approve a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN BOC clicks the 'Approve' button on the Trade.
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction status to "Approved"
AND after approval, page reloads for BOC with updated button set. 
AND BOC can also perform this action by selecting the transaction on the clipboard and hitting Approve as a single or bulk operation
AND when the transaction is approved, all participating Orgs get a clipboard notification "Outright (Trade) is approved"
AND Trade now becomes viewable to all other clubs though they cannot see attachments and comments
AND Player history entry becomes black font and is visible to all clubs
AND Clipboard approval item is removed for BOC
AND player's service calculation and 10/5 calc is updated 

**Global**
- Show success notification - "The transaction has been successfully Approved"
- Approve button is blue
- Status and dates section must update

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

title: As a club, I can reject a trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club
AND club is viewing trade submitted to them
custom_steps: WHEN club hits the 'Reject' button on the Trade
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction status to "Rejected"
AND page reloads for rejecting club with updated button set. See button state table
AND any action items for other participating clubs are automatically removed 
AND all other participating clubs gets a notification with Description = Outright (Trade)  is rejected by [Org]
AND the notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees an updated button set with full edit access similar to preliminary
AND initiating club can resubmit the rejected Trade to "Submit to Club" state or can delete the transaction
AND no rule checks should be run

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully rejected"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I can reject a Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND viewing a submitted trade
custom_steps: WHEN BOC hits the Reject button on the Trade
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction to "Rejected"
AND reverses all Submit updates in story #129462741
AND page reloads for BOC with updated button set. See button state table
AND all participating clubs get a notification with Description = Outright (Trade) is rejected by BOC
AND initiating club receives a rejection notification. (The notification links back to the Transaction. The initiating club sees an updated button set with full edit access similar to preliminary. Other Orgs only see it in view mode with a Close button.)
AND initiating club can resubmit the rejected Trade to "Submit to Club" state or can delete the transaction
AND remove transaction from approvals clipboard and from Player history

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully rejected"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

title: As BOC, I can reverse a trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND viewing an approved trade
custom_steps: WHEN BOC hits 'Reverse' button the the Approved Trade
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction status to "Reversed"
AND BOC may only reverse this trade if it is the most recent approved transaction for all involved players. (If not, show hard error "Only a player's latest approved transaction can be reversed")
AND reverse all Approval updates in story #129463383 and reset all players to their Org/roster status prior to the transaction. 
AND page reloads for BOC with updated button set. See button state table
AND all participating clubs get a notification with Description = Outright (Trade)  is reversed
AND player history and daily trans bulletin gets (Voided) next to description
AND if an auto-recall was created, that gets reversed also.
AND Rule 4 draft picks traded value and intl signing bonus slot adjustments must be reversed to their original value

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully reversed"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I can suppress a trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND viewing a Reversed Trade
custom_steps: WHEN BOC clicks the 'Suppress' button on the Reversed Trade
custom_expected:
THEN this updates the transaction status to "Reversed"
AND page reloads for BOC with updated button set. See button state table
AND when a transaction is suppressed it will be hidden from the player's Player History, Searches (unless BOC user specifically searches suppressed transactions) and any other place where it is visible on UI.
AND BOC may perform the Reverse and Suppress at the same time on an approved transaction using "Reverse and Suppress" option

**Global**
- Show blue success notification - "The transaction has been successfully reversed"
- The status and dates section updates with latest state change

**Reference**
Button states - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2310830?projectId=14044

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from a Trading a player not affiliated with any Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club
custom_steps: WHEN attempting to trade a player not affiliated with any Org
custom_expected:
THEN onCreate Business rule #1.30 (Player must have a current or pending Org to proceed with the Trade) is run as soon as user tries to create the transaction
AND error message appears: "This transaction can only be performed on a player who is currently affiliated with an organization."

title: As a club, I want to be stopped from acquiring a signing bonus slot if I've already exceeded my Signing Bonus Pool
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as club/BOC
AND creating a trade where a club receives a signing bonus slot(s)
custom_steps:
WHEN my club has already exceeded my Signing Bonus Pool
AND user clicks Submit to Club
custom_expected:
THEN OnSubmit Business Rule # 2.23 (Rule: If an International Signing Bonus slot is being traded then calculate the receiving club's current International Signing Bonus Pool which is the sum of all of it's current slot values post adjustments and past trades but not including this trade. If the Club's "Total Signing Bonuses" exceeds the club's Signing Bonus pool, then show error) fires as a hard error for club and override for BOC
AND receive error message "[Org] may not acquire an International Signing Bonus slot because it has exceeded its Signing Bonus Pool for this signing period" 

Note:
This story has a dependency on the ETL story #129713963

title: As a club, I want to be warned if the Signing bonus slot that is being traded will be reduced in value as a result of the trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as a club or BOC
AND creating a trade with Signing Bonus slot considerations that will be reduced in value as a result of the trade
custom_steps: WHEN submitting the trade to club
custom_expected:
THEN OnSubmit Business Rule # 2.24 (SEE RULE BELOW) fires as a warning for both club and BOC
AND Error message reads "The international signing bonus slot [Slot #] - [Slot value] will be adjusted to [new slot value] since [acquiring Org] will have a Signing Bonus Pool that will exceed 150% of its original Pool."

Rule:
If one or more International Signing Bonus slots are being traded
 
Then calculate if the receiving club will exceed it's "Maximum Possible Pool" (150% of original pool value prior to trades/adjustments) by acquiring one or more Signing bonus slots. If it will exceed, then show error.
 
To calculate the new slot value, the smallest of the newly acquired slot's value is reduced to the amount needed to equal the Maximum Possible value (150% of original pool value). 

Please see referenced International Signing Bonus rule document to see how to calculate Original Signing Bonus pool (34.1) and Maximum Possible Pool (34.2) 

Note:
This story has a dependency on the ETL story #129713963

**AC**
 This is an OnSubmit rule
- Warning for both club and BOC
- Bus rule # 2.24

**Reference**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1735522?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I want to ensure that trades are correctly classified as Major or Minor League
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: When a Trade is being moved to the status of "Submit to BOC" from "Submit to Club"
custom_expected:
THEN if the Trade is a Minor League trade, verify that all players in the trade are Minor League players. If this check fails and there are MJ players, change the Trade level to Major League.
AND if the trade is a Major league trade, verify that at least one involved player must be in the Major Leagues or on Option. If check fails, then change the Trade level to Minor League.
AND On the BOC clipboard, the trade should display the correct level Major / Minor

title: As BOC, I want to be stopped from approving the Trade if prior unapproved transactions exist
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN approving a trade
custom_expected:
THEN in addition to running all the On-Submit rules, Bus rule 2.51 (A Player's transaction cannot be approved until other pending transactions with earlier dates have been approved) is also run 
AND if the rule fails, show error "A transaction cannot occur before the date of the player's latest approved or pending transaction"

title: As BOC, I want to be stopped from approving a future Trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN approving a trade
custom_expected:
THEN in addition to running all the On-Submit rules, This rule is also run on approval and is a hard error for BOC: Bus rule 2.52 - The Transaction Date must not be after the current date. 
AND if rule fails, show error: "This transaction cannot be approved unless the Transaction date is on or before the current date"

title: As Club/BOC, I want to see file attachment rule checks on Save
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a club or BOC user attaches files in any state, run the standard global file attachment rule checks on save and on state changes
custom_expected:
THEN run the standard global file attachment rule checks on save and on state changes:

- Check to make sure that the file attachment is correct format - use the following message:
Eg. Attached file is not in a valid PDF format. Verify or re-scan and re-attach.
 
- Do not reuse a label that can only be used once. Only Miscellaneous maybe re-used as a label. Note that each player has a separate unique set of labels
Eg. Only one file attachment may have the label '[Label name]'.
 
- The label is a required field for all attachments. If the label is not populated for any row, when the club tries to SAVE, show required field warning
"Attached Files - Label is a required field"

- Only show the error once even if multiple rows are missing labels

title: As BOC, I want to see rule checks when I approve a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN the BOC approves a transaction
custom_expected:
THEN run all the On-Submit rule checks 
AND BOC can over-ride all rule checks except for required field errors, rule 2.00 (to select at least 2 organizations) and 2.03 (trade cannot be dated before player's most recent tx)
AND additionally, on Create rule 1.30 should be a hard error for BOC.
AND for 2.01 and 2.02 - when checking if trade was submitted within 10 or 5 days, always use the first "Submitted by [Org]" date to compare against the trade date. 

**Global**
* Errors/warnings should trigger the global error modal
* Errors/warnings should be pinned to the browser after dismissing the error modal
* Missed required fields should be outlined in red

**Reference**
Business Rules List - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2010367?projectId=14044

title: As a Club, I want traded player's pending Org and Roster status to get updated when trade is submitted to BOC
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN a Trade reaches "Submitted to BOC" state
custom_expected:
THEN set each player's pending Org and Club to the To Org and Club.
AND if the player is a MJ league player, and it is in season (club system dates - season start to last playoff date),  then set the player's pending roster status to "Not Yet Reported"
AND if the player is a MJ league player, and it is off-season,  then set the player's pending roster status to "Active"
AND if the player's current MJ roster status is 60 Day DL and if the "To Org" already has 40 players under control, then set the Pending roster status to "60 Day DL"
AND if the player's current MJ roster status is Optioned, then set the pending MN roster status to Null.
AND all other players do not receive a pending roster status

title: As BOC, I want the player's Org and Roster status to be updated on approving the Trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a Trade reaches "Approved" state
custom_expected:
THEN the player's pending Org/club/roster status set earlier in #129462741 now become his current Org/club/Roster status
AND players without a pending roster status retain their existing roster statuses

title: As a Club/BOC, I want to see Player History updated with the Trade information
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a Trade reaches Submitted to BOC state
custom_expected:
THEN Player history now has an entry in green font for each player involved in the Trade.
AND the description for the entry is "Outright (Trade)" and it only has the Org/club he originated from and got traded to (even if other clubs were also involved in the trade)
AND the description clicks into the Trade form
AND while the trade is pending, it's only visible to all participating Orgs + BOC

title: Recalculate player's CBT impact on approval of Outright Trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN an Outright Trade is approved
custom_expected:
THEN the system should recalculate the CBT impact of any player involved in the trade.

*Ask Scott Tiedemann if you have any questions*

title: As a club, I want my action item to get cleared once I've approved a trade
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club
custom_steps: WHEN a participating club has approved the trade
custom_expected:
THEN the associated action item should be cleared.
AND if multiple clubs have to approve the trade, the action item should be cleared as soon as each individual club approves the trade, irrespective of when the other clubs approve the trade.
AND if BOC moves the trade forward through the workflow by Submitting it to BOC directly or approving it etc, this action should also clear the action items from club's clipboards

*Note:* if the trade is rejected however, it get's cleared from all club's clipboards as implemented in story #126536331

title: As a Club, I want an optioned player to get recalled automatically when Trade is approved
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as club
AND a trade includes at least one optioned player
custom_steps: WHEN the trade is approved
custom_expected:
THEN create a Recall-Not to Report Transaction for any player whose MJ roster status was Optioned prior to the Trade
AND the Recall transaction should be auto-approved with a Submitted to BOC time stamp of one second prior to the Trade's Submit to BOC timestamp, and an approved time stamp of one second prior to the Trade's approved timestamp.
AND on the recall transaction, set the From Org/ From club to the Major league Org and club that player is originating from
AND the recall transaction should do all of it's usual post submission/approval updates

title: As BOC, I want an approved Trade to appear on the Daily Transaction Bulletin
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND a trade involves any MJ players
custom_steps: WHEN the trade is approved
custom_expected:
THEN update the Daily transaction bulletin. Refer linked Jama document for formatting
AND for each player movement, create entry under both the receiving and originating Org
AND minor lg players are also listed in the bulletin if they were part of the MJ trade
AND draft picks and Intl SB slot trades are also listed in the bulletin under both receiving org and originating org

**Reference**
https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2309499?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I want approved draft pick trades to appear on the Pre-draft screen of the Draft
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND a trade with draft picks inlcuded
custom_steps: WHEN that trade has been approved
custom_expected:
THEN if any draft picks were traded, update the Pre-Draft screen on the Rule 4 dashboard (in drupal ebis 2.0)
AND the "Competitive Balance Lottery Picks A" and "Competitive balance lottery Picks B" widgets both have a "Traded to" column which should be updated with the new Org that the pick was Traded to.
AND if this pick is traded again, on the Trade screen, ensure that the pick is listed under the ORG that currently owns it (that is the previous Traded To Org)


**Note**
- Note that the draft order itself will not get updated until a BOC user regenerates the draft order.
- Also note that the pre-draft screen will continue to be editable to BOC and   the Traded to value can be overwritten by a BOC user on the Pre-draft screen.

title: As BOC, I want the international slot values to get adjusted when I approve a Trade
custom_preconds:
GIVEN logged in as BOC
AND a trade has international signing bonus slots included
custom_steps: WHEN the trade is approved
custom_expected:
THEN  if the slot value should be adjusted to a smaller amount as a result of this rule check #131318845, then make the adjustment now.
AND if this slot is subsequently traded, it will continue to be traded at the adjusted value

Note:
This adjusted slot value needs to be sent back to Ebis 1 so it can be seen in the Signing Bonus Utility. See #129713963 for details

**Reference**
Signing bonus rules - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/1735522?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I want to search for Trades
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN navigating to Advanced Search
custom_expected:
THEN Outright Trade is an option in the Transaction Type filter under Transactions search
AND all transaction filters can be used for searching for Trades. Additionally Trades should show up in search results when doing general transaction searches
AND users cannot see trades that they don't have permission to see
AND results appear with the same column set as other transactions
AND when listing search results, each of the following considerations has it's own row/result:
- Each player under Player considerations has their own row. Do not include PTBNL players
- Each Rule 4 draft pick has it's own row. Player name field is just blank
- Each International Signing Bonus has it's own row. Player name field is blank

**Reference**
Transaction search - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2282716?projectId=14044

title: As BOC, I can update the transaction post transaction approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as BOC
custom_steps: WHEN viewing an already approved trade transaction
custom_expected:
THEN BOC can continue to update certain fields which are as follows:
*- Received Insurance form date for all players*
*- All attachments including player specific and general form attachments*
*- All fields in the Cash Consideration section and Pay schedule*
*- Player to be Named - All fields except the To Org*
*- All fields in Conditional Cash consideration section*
*- Comments*
AND any field not listed above is uneditable to BOC. BOC cannot modify the Orgs involved in the transaction
AND Clubs continue to have the same basic edit access to the approved trade as listed in #129462267

title: As BOC, I can create a trade on behalf of the club
custom_steps:
**AC**
- BOC can create and save a Trade using the Create New menu on any player 
- The 'Paid on' fields are editable to BOC on Cash considerations, Pay schedules and Player to be Named sections. Clubs cannot edit the Paid on field
- BOC can send MJ players to MN club and vice versa. The restrictions in #126081417 do not apply to BOC
- BOC can add new signatories for any club involved in the trade
- BOC can add additional rows for cash considerations for any Org
- BOC can see and update BOC Notes section
- BOC can upload files for all player rows for all involved Orgs in the Player section

title: UAT Feedback: As Club/BOC, I want the player name in a trade to link to Player profile in view mode
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as club or BOC
custom_steps: WHEN a trade is in view mode in any status
custom_expected:
THEN the player's names in 'Player considerations' and 'Player to be named later' considerations should link to his player profile player history. 
AND Global Link styling should apply and Ctrl+click / right click should allow you to open the link in a new tab/window.
AND it does not have to be linked in edit mode
AND if a player's name appears in the Rule 4 draft pick section, it should also link to his player profile.

title: As a club, I want to start a Trade with a player from another Org
custom_preconds: GIVEN logged in as a club
custom_steps: WHEN a club user navigates to a player's profile who is in a different org, and then creates a new trade from the 'create' icon on the player header or player history widget
custom_expected:
THEN club should be allowed to proceed with the Trade (this is already happening)
AND the trade screen should pre-load that player with the Org he belongs to (this is already happening currently)
AND additionally, the trade screen should also auto-add the initiating club to the page. 
AND the initiating club cannot remove themselves from the trade screen.
AND club can continue to build out the rest of the trade as usual and Submit it to Club

title: As a club, I can see rule checks when I approve a trade
custom_steps:
**Reference**
Business Rules List - https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2010367?projectId=14044

**AC**
- When the Club hits 'Submit to BOC', all the same On-Submit rule checks must be run as when the initiating club submitted the Trade.
- If any hard errors are triggered, the club is forced to hit the Back button and cannot continue with Trade submission. Note that the club will not be able to edit the transaction themselves so their only course of action is to reject the transaction (covered in a later story)
- If only overrides are triggered, the Club may over ride the warnings and continue with Trade submission

**Global**
* Errors/warnings should trigger the global error modal
* Errors/warnings should be pinned to the browser after dismissing the error modal
* Missed required fields should be outlined in red
